choiceresponse.p: In Trainingland, navigate to the app where you can use the Follow-Up Analysis tool.

label.h3: What dimensions must be selected to run Follow-Up Analysis?

div.p: To run Follow-Up Analysis in the Data Quality app, you must select a data set, organisation unit and a period. The threshold and z-score or min/max limits must be selected for Outlier Detection. The Validation Rule Group must be selected for Batch Validation Rule Analysis.
